reviewText: had to return it because it could not be viewed on my machine - it was region 2 and my machine only does region 1 or all.
was unable to view on my bluray

Didn't know these DVDS were region 2. That was my fault. Didn't catch that when I read product description, it said that though. These are good movies,  I just need to buy the ones that you can play in U.S.A.
